meanings.definition: A genus of fungi that includes plant pathogens.
meanings.sent1: Farmers must protect their crops from rhizoctonia to ensure a healthy harvest.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the effects of rhizoctonia on different plant species.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous garden gnome blamed the poor harvest on rhizoctonia sneaking into the fields.
meanings.sent4: The spread of rhizoctonia in the garden was like a silent invasion, slowly damaging the plants.
meanings.sent5: The presence of rhizoctonia in the soil was a looming threat to the entire garden.

meanings.definition: A disease caused by fungi of the genus Rhizoctonia.
meanings.sent1: The farmer treated the rhizoctonia in the soil to prevent the disease from spreading.
meanings.sent2: Rhizoctonia can lead to wilting and yellowing of plant leaves if left untreated.
meanings.sent3: The garden party was ruined when rhizoctonia decided to crash and infect the plants.
meanings.sent4: The rhizoctonia disease crept through the garden like a shadow, causing havoc along the way.
meanings.sent5: The impact of rhizoctonia disease on the crops was devastating, leaving the fields barren.

meanings.sent2: Rhizoctonia mycelium plays a crucial role in the decomposition of organic matter.
